description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. StarField Battle is a fast paced shooter that puts you in the middle of space and challenges you get obtain a high score.  Includes power-ups and multiple weapon types and multiple enemies.
